item.description:
Let's enjoy a first Friday outdoors for summer!   The patio area just to the right of the entrance (as you face the building) has it's own little bar area for ordering drinks and food easily. 

Stop by anytime throughout the evening.  It may be standing room only since this is a popular place and, now, this is a popular meetup event! 

I'll try to get us some seating but PLEASE note that it is VERY limited.  Come only if you don't mind that seats/tables may not be available.  

If you don't see us, please feel free to TEXT me.  (I don't think I'll hear a ring with the band playing!)  857-225-1248.   :)  Melody

Check out the menu, etc. at  http://www.thefatcactus.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll go early to try to grab some seats outside on the patio between the outdoor bar window and the band
item.name: Happy Hour - First Friday - Outdoor patio at Fat Cactus! Rt. 1 N. Lynnfield
